content: I swear on these boing-tastic ears of mine~, I'll show you what real danger — Ahem...

content: If you don't know what to do, just talk to Mobai. If you're looking to buy or sell goods, go see Glenn. {A得意}And if you're bored, just come see me!
info: 莫白送新屋-艾莎莎尼闲聊_主流程文本

content: Avoid large bodies of water and ramps... Don't build too close to other buildings, and... definitely don't put it in the way of my car, 'cause I'll crash into it and send it flying! Yup.
info: 莫白送新屋-艾莎莎尼闲聊_主流程文本

content: Wait, no — I mean, I'll keep you safe while we're out and about! <style=SizeSmall>The look Mobai just shot my way was... super duper wild...</style>
info: 莫白送新屋-艾莎莎尼闲聊_主流程文本

content: Alright, let's get set up — Ah! Not in the camp, {A惊讶}this is a shared space. Looks like you can't leave anything up to fate.

content: When is Mobai gonna let me go out and have some fun? Hey, <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, are you choosing a spot for your home? {A看我的}Ask me, ask me! I got a lotta experience in picking good spots!
info: 莫白送新屋-艾莎莎尼闲聊_主流程文本

content: If I were to choose a location for my home, I'd close my eyes, take seven steps to the left, three steps forward, turn right, take one more step, and that'd settle it!
info: 莫白送新屋-艾莎莎尼闲聊_主流程文本
